The document reviews the application of AI and blockchain technologies in education technology for career guidance. The review focuses on the combination of AI based career assessment tools and blockchain security systems in educational technology. The review highlights the need for further research to create effective and secure career guidance platforms that leverage the power of AI and blockchain.
